QuestData.Title: Fine Dining
QuestData.Description: In my living years, I was the greatest warrior of the swarm.$B$BHelp me regain my strength, and I shall show you.$B$BI smell the salt sea nearby, and where you can find the sea, you will find briny clackers.$B$BBring me their tails. I must feast upon their flesh.
QuestData.CompletionText: I have much work to do. The sooner I can fight, the sooner I can return to the Council.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. This shall give me the strength to vanquish my foes.
